text: Charles Clarence Robert Orville Cummings (June 9, 1910 â€“ December 2, 1990) was an American television and movie actor. He starred in many television programs and lots of movies in the 1940s and 1950s. He was born in Joplin, Missouri. On December 2, 1990, Cummings died of kidney failure and complications from pneumonia. He died at the Motion Picture & Television Country House and Hospital in Woodland Hills, California.Flint, Peter B. "Robert Cummings Is Dead at 82; Debonair Actor in TV and Films." The New York Times, December 4, 1990. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:Actors from Missouri Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:1910 births Category:1990 deaths
title: Robert Cummings
